pr_title: [FLINK-18713][table-planner-blink] Change duration configOption to duration type

timeline.message: [FLINK-18713][table-planner-blink] Change duration configOption to to duration type
Fix test failed and update doc for config options changed

timeline.bodyText:
The default value is 0ms now. It would be better to mention the meaning of default value, otherwise it's confusing.

Default value is 0, which means detecting source idleness is not enabled.
